name: Paradise
content: Dream away, dream away, with me tonight
Cause there is love in the air
Lets come with me to a paradise
来到幸福之地 我们一起隐居
Together forever, you and me tonight
今夜你和我 永远在一起
和我一起 和我一起 时光飞逝
Almost too good to be true
太过美好几乎不敢相信
真实无比 就像你眼中流露的情意
Its for me and for you
Lets come with me to a paradise
来到幸福之地 我们一起隐居
Together forever, you and me tonight
今夜你和我 永远在一起
